MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the ML5 area of Coatbridge. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 10:42am. Our engineers have arrived onsite at the local substation to investigate the fault and the team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1:45pm. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:47am on Friday, 29 January 2021
